channel.title: I Don't Get It

item.title: I Don't Get It
item.dc:creator: @Ryan4965 Ryan4965
item.description:
@Ryan4965 wrote:

Ok so I made a system on my server that when you finish a slayer task, it finds out wether it belongs in the low, medium or high slayer tasks, and gives different amounts of slayer points depending on the difficulty.

Here’s a code:

if (npcs[i].npcType == 1153 && temp.taskID == 1153) { temp.addSkillXP(15000, 18); temp.taskAmount -= 1; if (temp.taskAmount == 0) { temp.taskID = -1; temp.taskAmount = -1; if(npcs[i].npcType == temp.lowTask[npcs[i].npcType]) { temp.slayerPoints += 1; temp.sM("You have completed your task. Talk to a slayer master to get a new one."); temp.sM("You gain 1 slayer points. You now have " +temp.slayerPoints+ " slayer points."); } if(npcs[i].npcType == temp.mediumTask[npcs[i].npcType]) { temp.slayerPoints += 2; temp.sM("You have completed your task. Talk to a slayer master to get a new one."); temp.sM("You gain 1 slayer points. You now have " +temp.slayerPoints+ " slayer points."); } if(npcs[i].npcType == temp.highTask[npcs[i].npcType]) { temp.slayerPoints += 3; temp.sM("You have completed your task. Talk to a slayer master to get a new one."); temp.sM("You gain 3 slayer points. You now have " +temp.slayerPoints+ " slayer points."); } if(npcs[i].npcType == temp.masterTask[npcs[i].npcType]) { temp.slayerPoints += 4; temp.sM("You have completed your task. Talk to a slayer master to get a new one."); temp.sM("You gain 4 slayer points. You now have " +temp.slayerPoints+ " slayer points."); } } }

However, when I finish a task, the task completes, yet I don’t get the messages saying I completed the task, and I don’t gain the points.

Read full topic
